00025 // the Font class -------------------------------------------------------------+
00026 enum FontMode { fmNone = 0, fmBitmap, fmTexture, fm3d };
00027 
00028 class CGLFont {
00029 friend void glTextout(const CGLFont *, const char *, float, float);
00030 friend void glTextPrintf(const CGLFont *, float, float, const char *, ...);
00031 
00032 public:
00033         CGLFont(): m_FontMode(fmNone), m_iList(0), m_iTexture(0) { }
00034         ~CGLFont() { Delete(); }
00035 
00036         // methods:
00037         bool Init2d(HDC hdcContext, FontMode fm, HFONT hFont, GLuint iWidth, GLuint iHeigth, GLuint iTexture = 0);
00038         bool Init3d(HDC hdcContext, HFONT hFont, float fDeviation, float fExtrusion, int iFormat);
00039         float TextWidth(const char *strText);
00040         float TextHeight() { return m_fSize[0][1]; }
00041         void Delete();
00042 
00043         // some additional static methods:
00044         static bool Create2dCourierFont(const CGLApp *glApp, CGLFont &glFont, GLuint iWidth, GLuint iHeight);
00045 private:
00046         FontMode m_FontMode;
00047         GLuint m_iList;                  // font's display list
00048         GLuint m_iTexture;               // texture id if necessary
00049         float m_fSize[256][2];   // instead of the GLYPHMETRICSFLOAT structure
00050 };
00051 
00052 // functions for text drawing -------------------------------------------------+
00053 void glBeginText(int iScrW, int iScrH);
00054 void glEndText();
